title: Double click to open duplicate session
author: msmigiel
body_snippet:
Currently, when you double click on an entry in the Connections tree, it will either open a new session if one does not already exist or it will focus on the session if it's already open. If I right click on the entry and say Connect, it will open a new session but next to the existing one. 

To me it makes more sense that double clicking on an entry in the Connections tree that a new session would open at the end of the open tabs. Perhaps this could be added as an option?

comments.snippet: Note that this also happens in the Quick Connect Toolbar, when clicking on the little blue globe - that connection tree has similar behavior, so please address both places.
